experience.company: University of Washington Math Study Center
experience.description: Provided instructional support for students in multivariable calculus and linear algebra. Facilitated study sessions focusing on complex mathematical proofs and statistical applications.
Assisted the financial planning team with data entry and basic trend analysis using Excel. Observed quarterly risk assessment meetings to understand corporate financial structures.
Managed student housing records and processed application data with high accuracy. Utilized database software to organize resident information and generate occupancy reports.
